rules_text:
Trample
When this creature enters, each player sacrifices a permanent. If you descended this turn, each opponent sacrifices a permanent instead. [i](You descended if a permanent card was put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“What has seelenite devoured of our culture? What will it hunger for still?”
—Brammen, street screecher[/i]
